rooms.name: Entrance Hall

rooms.name: Garage & Utility
rooms.description: Two-car garage integrated on the corner plot with adjacent utility storage, accessible via ramps.

rooms.name: Living Area
rooms.description: Open-plan living area adjoining kitchen. Large windows for natural light, designed per Vastu principles.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: Modern, open-plan kitchen with wheelchair-accessible countertops and accessible storage. Includes cooking island.

rooms.name: Dining Area
rooms.description: Seamless dining space within the living area, with Vastu-aligned seating arrangements.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: Private master bedroom located on ground floor for joint family convenience. Features en-suite bathroom, accessible design, and south-eastern orientation as per Vastu.

rooms.name: Guest Bedroom
rooms.description: Additional guest room with shared access to an adjoining sitting area. Designed with accessibility in mind.

rooms.name: Family Bathroom
rooms.description: Central bathroom accessible from living and master bedroom areas, ensuring compliance with Vastu and universal design guidelines.
